description:
Cancellations on Max have become increasingly common in recent years. However, there’s one cancellation from when the service was still titled HBO Max that still has the show’s creators “deeply frustrated.” Of course, fans no doubt feel the same, so it seems to be a disappointing decision for everyone that the HBO Max series was [...]

The post Creators Frustrated After HBO Max Cancels Series appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Creators Frustrated After HBO Max Cancels Series
